content: I released 0.3.0 last night with the change to add a version header to the binary file format. I've also opened a PR on rust-lang/rust to use the latest version. I felt this was important to get in soon so that Rust nightlies would be on the latest version.
@Wesley Wiser Could you please update the CHANGELOG? https://github.com/rust-lang/measureme/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
@Amanjeev Sethi Thanks for the reminder!
ha! that is such a natural thing. I really like gitflow for this reason so there is less to forget but then I forget that many times myself lol
